title: My Pixel 3a is VERY slow; I have stopped Digital Wellbeing. This is the slowest phone I have used.
content:
1. Restart the phone numerous times per day.
2. Disabled Digital Wellbeing.
3. Clear cache for individual apps multiple times per day.
4. Force stop apps multiple times per day.
5. Worked with Google support and restarted in safe mode.
6. I am on 200 mbps WiFi.
